statements: INSERT INTO email_marketing_campaigns (campaign_id, campaign_name, schedule_date, sql_query, target_segment) VALUES (1, 'Summer Sale Campaign', '2022-06-15 10:00:00', 'SELECT * FROM customers WHERE purchase_date >= `2022-01-01`', 'Summer Shoppers');

INSERT INTO email_marketing_campaigns (schedule_date, target_segment, campaign_name, campaign_id, sql_query) VALUES ('2022-07-01 08:30:00', 'VIP Customers', 'Monthly Newsletter', 2, 'SELECT email FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 500');

INSERT INTO email_marketing_campaigns (campaign_name, target_segment, schedule_date, campaign_id, sql_query) VALUES ('Flash Sale', 'Discount Lovers', '2022-06-20 15:00:00', 3, 'SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_purchase_date >= `2022-05-01`');
